properties.entry: SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND UP_FOLDER_NO IS NULL
SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND UP_FOLDER_NO = ?
SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE UP_FOLDER_NO = (SELECT UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND FOLDER_NO = ?)
